SELECT ORGAN_CODE AS unitId, COUNT(1) AS inPatientCount FROM inhospitalrecord where 1=1
AND ORGAN_CODE = #{query.unitId}
AND HP_DATE LIKE CONCAT(#{query.date},'%')
GROUP BY ORGAN_CODE

SELECT ed.ORGAN_CODE AS unitId,SUM(ed.cost_02) AS inPatientMoney,SUM(ed.cost_01) AS OPDMoney FROM ed_outpa_inpa_charge_stat AS ed where 1=1
AND ed.ORGAN_CODE = #{query.unitId}
AND ed.STAT_DATE LIKE CONCAT(#{query.date},'%')
GROUP BY ed.ORGAN_CODE

SELECT wm.`ORGAN_CODE` AS unitId,SUM(wm.OP_EM_HP_MARK='1' OR wm.OP_EM_HP_MARK='2') AS oPDDrugCount, SUM(wm.OP_EM_HP_MARK='3') inPatientDrugCount FROM WM_PrescriptionDetails AS wm where 1=1
AND wm.ORGAN_CODE = #{query.unitId}
AND wm.RX_DT LIKE CONCAT(#{query.date},'%')
GROUP BY wm.`ORGAN_CODE`
